name: Innes Ireland
introduction: Robert McGregor Innes Ireland (12th June 1930 - 22nd October 1993) was a British racing driver and military officer, born in Yorkshire, England.[2] Racing under the name Innes Ireland, the Brit raced for Team Lotus during the early phase of his Formula One career, claiming their (and his) maiden victory at the 1961 United States Grand Prix.[3]
